content.title: Add a TextBox Widget
content.body:
1. From the lower-left corner of Iris, go to the Default Library and click the search icon
  2. In the search bar, clear any previous text and enter TextBox.
  3. From the results, select TextBox, drag and drop the widget onto the emailField flex container in the canvas.
  4. Right-click on the new text box widget and rename the text box txtEmailID.
